mapper.insert: insert into news_${news.language} (id, title, description, info, source) value (#{id}, #{news.title}, #{news.description}, #{news.info}, #{news.source});
insert into news_user(newsId, userId) select #{noticeId}, id from app_users
mapper.select: select n.id, n.createTime, n.enabled, n.bannerUrl, tmp.* from news n left join news_${language} tmp on n.id = tmp.id where type = 1 and enabled = 1
select tmp.info from news n left join news_${language} tmp on n.id = tmp.id where n.id = #{id}
select n.id, n.bannerUrl, n.createTime, tmp.* from news n left join news_${language} tmp on n.id = tmp.id where n.id != #{id} and type =1 and enabled=1 order by RAND() LIMIT #{limitSize}

select n.id, n.createTime, tmp.title, tmp.description from news n left join news_${language} tmp on n.id = tmp.id left join news_user nu on n.id = nu.newsId where nu.userId = #{userId} and n.enabled = 1 and n.type = 2 order by n.createTime desc
select tmp.title, tmp.description, tmp.info, tmp.source from news n left join news_${language} tmp on n.id = tmp.id where n.id = #{id}
select n.id,tmp.title, tmp.info, n.createTime from news n left join news_${language} tmp on n.id = tmp.id where forceStatus=1 limit 1
